content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, I'm glad we're on the same page about the rental price. Let's negotiate.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I see you are a smart person, so I want to give you a good price. How about €800?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I appreciate the offer, but I'm looking for a bit more. I'm sure you can do better.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content:
€800 is a very reasonable price for such a central location. I can assure you that it's a good deal.
[Question]
[Question]
[Question]
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
